728821f-a.title: Richmond: Fingerboard Road - Hyland Boulevard
728821f-a.text:
375 Fingerboard Road, north side, between Hylan Boulevard and
Sherman Ave., showing the Bethlehem Orphan and Half Orphan Asylum.
The building is 225 feet back of the road.
March 25, 1925.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728821f-a.folder: Fingerboard Road & Hyland Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
